thread.title: Sport News: WWE 2K16 - Xbox Achievements reisen nach Suplex City
thread.title_full: Sport News: WWE 2K16 - Xbox Achievements reisen nach Suplex City

author: marcel@gamestrust.de (Fenix Caine)
title: Sport News: WWE 2K16 - Xbox Achievements reisen nach Suplex City
text:
WWE 2K16 Xbox Achievements reisen nach Suplex City 
In irgendeiner Weise musste Suplex City ja in WWE 2K16 Einzug halten. Das stellen die Achievements sicher, zumindest die versteckten. 
Eigentlich wollen wir euch im Vorfeld nicht verraten, welche versteckten Achievements in einem Spiel lauern (zumindest nicht ohne eine vorherige Spoiler-Warnung). Doch im Falle von WWE 2K16 dürfte es für einige Fans von Interesse sein, dass man 30 Gamerscore Punkte absahnen kann, wenn man einen Superstar mit Brock Lesnar an diesen Ort schickt. Dazu sind zehn Suplexes in einer Reihe notwendig - ihr dürft aber natürlich gerne weitere dranhängen, speziell wenn Rollins der Gegner ist. 

Und da wir gerade von Seth Rollins sprechen: Um ihn dreht sich ein weiteres, verstecktes Achievement. Das bringt 15 Punkte und erfordert eine Wiederholung des spektakulären Endes in seinem WrestleMania 31-Match gegen Randy Orton. Generell nehmen die WWE 2K16 -Achievements Bezug auf einige Ereignisse der Vergangenheit. "Over the ropes you go!" erinnert beispielsweise an die Leistung von Roman Reigns beim Royal Rumble 2014. 


Ansonsten drehen sich die Errungenschaften um das Meistern des 2K Showcase-Szenarios "Austin 3:16", das Erschaffen und Spielen eines eigenen Superstars und das Ausführen gewisser Manöver. Letztere verraten etwa die Rückkehr von OMG-Momenten und der Möglichkeit zum Anvisieren von Körperteilen in WWE 2K16 . 

WWE 2K16 Achievements Mr. Money in the Bank (70 points) - WWE Universe - Win Money in the Bank using a custom Superstar. (Single play) Universe Master (30 points) - WWE Universe - Play and win 50 matches. Road to WrestleMania (15 points) - WWE Universe - Win WrestleMania main event as the Royal Rumble winner. (Single play) Watch out! (50 points) - Successfully reverse a Finisher. (Single play) Comeback! (30 points) - Successfully perform a comeback move. (Single play) You can't let down your guard (50 points) - Perform a catch Finisher. (Single play) A winning combination! (50 points) - Use a wake-up taunt, land a Finisher, and immediately pin your opponent. (Single play) Excellent execution (50 points) - Attack every body part at least once using the limb targeting system. (Single play/Exhibition) Reached the ropes! (30 points) - Crawl to the ropes during a submission. (Single play) Oh! My! (15 points) - Put your opponent through the announce table via OMG! moment. (Single play/Exhibition) A winner is you (70 points) - Win at least 20 matches on Hard difficulty or higher in Universe or Exhibition. (Single play) Over the ropes you go! (15 points) - Eliminate 12 opponents with the same Superstar in a single Royal Rumble match. (Single play) Matchmaker (15 points) - Win in 20 match variations. (Single play) Locker room rat (15 points) - Complete a match with 50 different Superstars/Divas. (Single play) Unknown veteran (15 points) - Win 10 times using a custom Superstar. Tap! Tap! Tap! (15 points) - Make an opponent tap out with a submission that is not a Finisher or Signature move. (Single Play) Tragic commentators (15 points) - Destroy 2 announce tables within a single match. The ring is my playground (40 points) - Play a match using a custom arena. (Single play) One of a kind Superstar (40 points) - Create a custom Superstar that uses a Superstar head. 100 bouts (70 points) - Play 100 matches online. (Ranked matches) Expert in the ring (70 points) - Play each different match type. (Ranked matches) A creator is born (15 points) - Upload any kind of user created content once. Austin 3:16 (15 points) - 2K Showcase - Complete the "Austin 3:16" scenario. (Single play) Showcase master (20 points) - 2K Showcase - Complete all Bonus Matches. (Single play) Wrestling heritage (30 points) - 2K Showcase - Complete all objectives. Don't trust anybody (40 points) - 2K Showcase - Complete all Special Objectives. Stone Cold said so (15 points) - 2K Showcase - Unlock and view all video replays and images in the gallery. 
Versteckte Achievements Phenom vs. Scorpion (30 points) - WWE Universe - Win a WrestleMania match between Undertaker and Sting. (Single play) Lightning reflexes (15 points) - Reverse a curb stomp with the RKO catch Finisher. Suplex City (30 points) - With Lesnar, execute "German Suplex 4" or "Back Suplex 2" 10 times in a single match. (Single play) What? What? What? (20 points) - 2K Showcase WM19 scenario - Get out of 3 pins during the last Historical Objective. Bitte registrieren , um die Quelle zu sehen. Weitere News zu WWE 2K16 27.09.15
